entry.title: Payment Re-routing
entry.summary: The discussion revolves around how node A will know which nodes are connected to node B in the Lightning Network. Nick ODell suggests that B could advertise its connected peers similar to BGP AS-Paths. Rusty then asks about the routing mechanism in the Lightning Network, indicating that it's worth discussing in a separate thread. Kevin Greene acknowledges Rusty's suggestion and decides to start a new thread on the topic.
